looking_for: Customer experience platform. Advanced clienteling, omnichannel CX, in-store appointments, analytics

criteria.name: Unified 360Â° Customer Profile
criteria.explanation: Platform provides a single, real-time customer profile aggregating online/offline transactions, preferences, wishlists, style notes, and interaction history, accessible in every channel.

criteria.name: Advanced Clienteling Workspace for Associates
criteria.explanation: Store and remote associates can access personalized recommendations, past purchases, preferences, and curated looks; includes guided selling, lookbooks, and outreach tools.

criteria.name: In-Store + Online Wishlist Synchronization
criteria.explanation: Wishlists created online or in store sync in real time, with visibility to associates and customers.

criteria.name: Appointment Booking for Boutique Consultations
criteria.explanation: Customers can schedule appointments online; system manages associate availability, boutique capacity, reminders, and preferences.

criteria.name: Omnichannel Product Browsing & Availability
criteria.explanation: Real-time product catalog with store-level inventory visibility for both customers and associates.

criteria.name: Client Outreach & Personal Messaging Tools
criteria.explanation: Associates can send personalized messages (text, WhatsApp, email) with product suggestions, curated selections, or follow-up notes, with compliance and tracking.

criteria.name: VIP Segmentation & Lifecycle Analytics
criteria.explanation: Built-in dashboards tracking VIP tiers, client lifetime value, visit frequency, repeat rate, and churn risk, plus drill-downs.

criteria.name: Personalized Marketing Trigger Engine
criteria.explanation: System generates event-based triggers (e.g., wishlist back in stock, birthday, long-time-no-visit, new collection match with preferences).

criteria.name: Associate Performance & Clienteling Metrics
criteria.explanation: Dashboards that track outreach effectiveness, appointment conversions, curated recommendation performance, and client portfolio growth.

criteria.name: Real-Time Sync Between E-Commerce & Store Systems
criteria.explanation: Customer, wishlist, appointment, and interaction data update instantly between POS, e-commerce, and clienteling modules.

criteria.name: Remote Styling & Virtual Consultations
criteria.explanation: Support for virtual appointments with integrated video, curated selections, and shoppable links.

criteria.name: Client Portfolio Management
criteria.explanation: Associates can manage assigned client books with retention alerts and follow-up tasks.

criteria.name: Integrated Lookbook/Collection Launch Management
criteria.explanation: Tools to create style edits, new-collection previews, and curated assortments linked to customer preferences.

criteria.name: Unified Promotions & Client Eligibility Logic
criteria.explanation: Ability to display and enforce client-specific eligibility for VIP previews, early access, or exclusive events.

criteria.name: Mobile Associate App (Store Floor Use)
criteria.explanation: Associate-facing responsive or native app for clienteling, appointments, inventory, and recommendations.

criteria.name: Client Feedback & Interaction Capture
criteria.explanation: Ability to log service notes, preferences, consultation summaries, and post-appointment feedback.

criteria.name: Assisted Checkout / Remote Checkout
criteria.explanation: Associates can create carts for customers, send checkout links, or complete purchases without POS hopping.

criteria.name: Multi-Channel Campaign Insights
criteria.explanation: Reporting on campaign engagement across email, SMS, WhatsApp, and site behavior.

criteria.name: Social Commerce Integration
criteria.explanation: Ability to share curated selections or campaigns via Instagram/WhatsApp storefronts or track social engagement.

criteria.name: Gamified Client Engagement Tools
criteria.explanation: Features like badges for VIP actions, experience goals, or stylist-recommended style paths.

criteria.name: Store Events RSVP & Guest List Tools
criteria.explanation: Light management of in-store events, invites, and attendance tracking.

looking_for: Sales pipeline management, contact tracking, email automation, forecasting, mobile access

criteria.name: Visual Pipeline Management with Drag-and-Drop
criteria.explanation: Intuitive board view showing all deals across stages with ability to drag and update status, filter by rep, product line, or deal size.

criteria.name: Automatic Activity Logging from Email & Calendar
criteria.explanation: System captures emails, calls, and meetings automatically without manual data entry; bi-directional sync with Gmail/Outlook.

criteria.name: Built-In Email Sequences and Templates
criteria.explanation: Create and schedule multi-touch email campaigns with personalization tokens, A/B testing, and engagement tracking.

criteria.name: Smart Lead Scoring and Qualification
criteria.explanation: Automated lead scoring based on firmographics, engagement, and behavior; clear qualification criteria and routing rules.

criteria.name: Revenue Forecasting with AI Insights
criteria.explanation: Predictive forecasting based on historical win rates, pipeline velocity, and deal health; alerts for at-risk deals.

criteria.name: Native Mobile App for iOS and Android
criteria.explanation: Full-featured mobile experience for updating deals, logging calls, accessing contact info, and reviewing tasks on the go.

criteria.name: Contact and Company Enrichment
criteria.explanation: Automatically pull in company data, social profiles, tech stack, and contact info from public sources and databases.

criteria.name: Customizable Sales Reports and Dashboards
criteria.explanation: Drag-and-drop dashboard builder with pre-built templates for activity metrics, conversion rates, and team performance.

criteria.name: Integration with Slack, Zoom, and LinkedIn
criteria.explanation: Native integrations for sharing deal updates, scheduling calls, and importing LinkedIn connections without leaving the platform.

criteria.name: Territory and Account Assignment Rules
criteria.explanation: Automatic lead routing based on geography, industry, deal size, or round-robin; prevents duplicate ownership.

criteria.name: Collaborative Deal Rooms
criteria.explanation: Shared workspaces for complex deals where multiple stakeholders can view notes, files, and next steps.

criteria.name: Workflow Automation for Repetitive Tasks
criteria.explanation: Create rules to auto-assign tasks, send notifications, update fields, or trigger sequences based on deal activity.

criteria.name: API and Webhook Support for Custom Integrations
criteria.explanation: RESTful API with comprehensive documentation and webhook notifications for real-time data sync with other tools.

criteria.name: Duplicate Detection and Merge Tools
criteria.explanation: Automatically flag duplicate contacts and companies with smart merge suggestions to maintain clean data.

looking_for: Applicant tracking, candidate sourcing, interview scheduling, collaborative hiring, analytics

criteria.name: Multi-Stage Pipeline with Customizable Workflows
criteria.explanation: Flexible hiring pipelines per role with custom stages, automated transitions, and rejection templates; supports different workflows for technical vs non-technical roles.

criteria.name: Integrated Sourcing Tools and Chrome Extension
criteria.explanation: Built-in candidate sourcing from LinkedIn, GitHub, and other platforms; browser extension to add candidates directly from any site.

criteria.name: Self-Service Interview Scheduling
criteria.explanation: Candidates can book interviews from available time slots synced with team calendars; automatic timezone handling and calendar invites.

criteria.name: Collaborative Feedback and Scorecards
criteria.explanation: Structured interview scorecards with custom questions per role; feedback collection from all interviewers with rubric-based evaluation.

criteria.name: Candidate Relationship Management (CRM)
criteria.explanation: Nurture passive candidates with email sequences, talent pools, and engagement tracking; build pipelines before roles open.

criteria.name: Branded Career Site and Job Board Integration
criteria.explanation: Customizable careers page with company branding; one-click posting to LinkedIn, Indeed, AngelList, and niche job boards.

criteria.name: Video Interview Integration (Zoom, Teams, etc.)
criteria.explanation: Seamless scheduling and joining of video interviews with automatic recording and transcript generation.

criteria.name: Diversity and Inclusion Analytics
criteria.explanation: Track diversity metrics across pipeline stages, identify drop-off points, and measure effectiveness of inclusive hiring practices.

criteria.name: Automated Reference Checking
criteria.explanation: Send reference request templates, collect responses, and aggregate feedback without manual follow-up.

criteria.name: Offer Letter Generation and E-Signatures
criteria.explanation: Create offer letters from templates with auto-populated data; send for electronic signature via DocuSign or similar.

criteria.name: Recruitment Marketing Analytics
criteria.explanation: Track source effectiveness, cost per hire, time to fill, and conversion rates across all channels.

criteria.name: HRIS Integration for Seamless Onboarding
criteria.explanation: Automatic candidate-to-employee conversion with data sync to payroll, benefits, and onboarding systems.

criteria.name: Mobile App for Recruiters and Hiring Managers
criteria.explanation: Review candidates, provide feedback, and approve offers from mobile devices with push notifications for urgent actions.

criteria.name: Compliance and GDPR Tools
criteria.explanation: Automated data retention policies, consent management, and audit logs to ensure hiring compliance.

criteria.name: Slack Integration for Team Collaboration
criteria.explanation: Get candidate updates, share profiles, and collect quick feedback directly in Slack channels.

looking_for: Inventory management, production planning, procurement, financial reporting, multi-location support

criteria.name: Real-Time Multi-Location Inventory Tracking
criteria.explanation: Live inventory visibility across all warehouses and facilities with automated stock level alerts, bin location tracking, and transfer management.

criteria.name: Material Requirements Planning (MRP)
criteria.explanation: Automated calculation of material needs based on production schedules, BOMs, and lead times; generates purchase and work orders.

criteria.name: Bill of Materials (BOM) Management
criteria.explanation: Multi-level BOM creation with version control, engineering change orders, and cost roll-up calculations.

criteria.name: Production Scheduling and Shop Floor Control
criteria.explanation: Visual scheduling board with capacity planning, work center management, and real-time status updates from the shop floor.

criteria.name: Purchase Order Management and Vendor Portal
criteria.explanation: Create, approve, and track POs with automatic reorder points; vendor portal for order confirmations and delivery updates.

criteria.name: Quality Control and Inspection Workflows
criteria.explanation: Configure inspection plans, record test results, manage non-conformances, and track corrective actions.

criteria.name: Financial Accounting with Multi-Entity Support
criteria.explanation: General ledger, AP/AR, and financial reporting across multiple legal entities with intercompany transactions.

criteria.name: Job Costing and Work Order Tracking
criteria.explanation: Track actual vs estimated costs per job or work order with labor, material, and overhead allocation.

criteria.name: Barcode Scanning and Mobile Warehouse App
criteria.explanation: Mobile app for receiving, picking, cycle counting, and shipping with barcode/QR code scanning.

criteria.name: Demand Forecasting and Sales Order Management
criteria.explanation: Historical sales analysis for demand planning; sales order entry with ATP (available to promise) checking.

criteria.name: Lot and Serial Number Traceability
criteria.explanation: Full traceability from raw materials to finished goods with lot/serial tracking for recalls and compliance.

criteria.name: Shipping and Logistics Integration
criteria.explanation: Integration with carriers (UPS, FedEx, freight) for rate shopping, label printing, and shipment tracking.

criteria.name: Custom Reporting and Business Intelligence
criteria.explanation: Drag-and-drop report builder with pre-built templates; export to Excel, PDF; schedule automated reports.

criteria.name: User Role-Based Permissions and Audit Trails
criteria.explanation: Granular permission controls by module and data type; complete audit logs for financial and inventory transactions.

criteria.name: Cloud-Based with Offline Mode
criteria.explanation: SaaS deployment with automatic updates; offline capability for shop floor data collection with sync when online.

looking_for: Task management, time tracking, resource allocation, client portals, budget tracking

criteria.name: Multi-Project Dashboard with Timeline View
criteria.explanation: Unified view of all active projects with Gantt charts, dependencies, critical path highlighting, and milestone tracking.

criteria.name: Customizable Task Workflows and Statuses
criteria.explanation: Create custom workflows per project type (e.g., content, design, campaigns) with automated status transitions and notifications.

criteria.name: Built-In Time Tracking with Timer
criteria.explanation: One-click time tracking on tasks with start/stop timer, manual entry, and timesheet approval workflow.

criteria.name: Resource Capacity Planning and Allocation
criteria.explanation: Visual resource scheduler showing team availability, workload distribution, and allocation across projects; alerts for over-allocation.

criteria.name: Client Portal for Project Updates
criteria.explanation: Branded client portal where clients can view progress, approve deliverables, leave feedback, and access project files.

criteria.name: Budget Tracking and Profitability Reports
criteria.explanation: Set project budgets with tracked vs estimated hours, expense logging, and real-time profitability calculations.

criteria.name: File Sharing and Version Control
criteria.explanation: Centralized file storage with version history, commenting on files, and integration with Google Drive and Dropbox.

criteria.name: Automated Task Dependencies and Reminders
criteria.explanation: Set task dependencies that auto-adjust dates when predecessors change; automated reminders for upcoming and overdue tasks.

criteria.name: Recurring Tasks and Project Templates
criteria.explanation: Save project structures as templates for repeated workflows; support for recurring tasks (daily, weekly, monthly).

criteria.name: Team Collaboration Tools (Comments, @mentions)
criteria.explanation: Rich commenting on tasks with @mentions, file attachments, and threaded discussions; email notifications.

criteria.name: Invoice Generation from Time Entries
criteria.explanation: Create invoices directly from logged time and expenses; export to accounting software or send to clients.

criteria.name: Kanban and Calendar View Options
criteria.explanation: Switch between list, board (Kanban), Gantt, and calendar views per user preference; saved filters and custom views.

criteria.name: Integration with Slack, Zoom, and Email
criteria.explanation: Native integrations to create tasks from Slack, sync with calendar apps, and turn emails into tasks.

criteria.name: Custom Fields and Metadata
criteria.explanation: Add custom fields to projects and tasks (dropdowns, dates, numbers) for tracking client-specific data.

criteria.name: Mobile App for iOS and Android
criteria.explanation: Full mobile experience for task updates, time tracking, file access, and notifications on the go.
